name: ClearSign Technologies Corporation
description: ClearSign Technologies Corporation is a technology company that specializes in the development of advanced combustion and emissions control technologies for the industrial and commercial sectors. Founded in 2009 and headquartered in Seattle, Washington, ClearSign aims to provide innovative solutions that enhance operational efficiency and reduce environmental impact. The company has developed proprietary technologies, including its ClearSign Core® technology, which significantly lowers emissions of nitrogen oxides (NOx) and carbon monoxide (CO) while improving fuel efficiency. These technologies are particularly applicable in industries such as oil and gas, power generation, and process heating. ClearSign's mission is to lead the way in clean combustion solutions, addressing the growing demand for sustainable practices in energy-intensive sectors. With a focus on research and development, ClearSign continues to expand its product offerings and market reach, helping customers comply with increasingly stringent environmental regulations and improve their overall operational performance. The company is committed to creating a sustainable future through innovative engineering and effective technologies.
